title: Insurance advisor informational website with online inquiry form

requirements.text: Create a multi-section informational website for an insurance advisor that clearly presents the advisor’s offerings across: term insurance (including HDFC Life), health insurance, vehicle insurance, property insurance, stock insurance, group mediclaim insurance, and other insurance products.

quotes: I am a Insurance advisor who sells all type of insurance including Term insurance (HDFC Life), health insurance, vehicle insurance, property insurance, stock insurance, group mediclaim insurance and others with multiple insurance companies.

acceptanceCriteria: The site includes a clear section (or page) for each of the listed insurance types.
Each insurance type section includes concise English copy describing what it covers, who it is for, and what information a prospect should prepare before inquiring.
The site includes a section listing partner/available insurers, explicitly including “HDFC Life”, and supports displaying multiple companies.

requirements.text: Add an online inquiry flow that lets visitors submit an insurance inquiry from the website, including a form with at minimum: full name, phone number, email (optional), insurance type (select), preferred company (optional), and a free-text message/requirements field.

quotes: I would like to create an website providing all the information about the insurance and would like to get the inquiry online for the same.

acceptanceCriteria: Submitting the form shows validation errors for missing required fields and for invalid phone/email formats (when provided).
On successful submission, the user sees an on-page success confirmation and the form resets.
The inquiry is persisted in the Motoko canister with a server-generated id and createdAt timestamp.

requirements.text: Implement backend inquiry storage and APIs in the single Motoko actor to support creating inquiries and listing inquiries for authenticated admin viewing.

quotes: would like to get the inquiry online

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes a method to create an inquiry (stores name, phone, email?, insuranceType, preferredCompany?, message, createdAt, and a unique id).
Backend exposes a method to list inquiries in reverse chronological order.
Backend restricts listing inquiries to authenticated users (Internet Identity principal) and denies anonymous access.

requirements.text: Add an admin-only dashboard page in the frontend that allows the advisor to sign in with Internet Identity and view submitted inquiries (read-only), including basic filtering by insurance type and a detail view per inquiry.
acceptanceCriteria: Admin dashboard requires Internet Identity login; unauthenticated users are prompted to sign in.
After login, the dashboard displays a table/list of inquiries with created date/time, name, phone, insurance type, and preferred company (if provided).
Selecting an inquiry shows full details including the message/requirements field.
A simple filter for insurance type is available and updates the visible list.

requirements.text: Define and apply a cohesive, modern visual theme for the site (colors, typography, spacing, components) appropriate for a professional insurance advisor brand, and enforce it consistently across all pages/sections.

quotes: create an website providing all the information about the insurance

acceptanceCriteria: The site uses a consistent design system (buttons, inputs, headings, cards, spacing) across the marketing sections, inquiry form, and admin dashboard.
The chosen palette avoids default-looking styling and is not blue+purple unless explicitly required (not required here).
All user-facing text is in English and reads professionally.

requirements.text: Add generated static image assets for the site (stored under frontend/public/assets/generated) and use them in the UI.

quotes: create an website providing all the information about the insurance

acceptanceCriteria: All required generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced directly by the frontend (not served via the backend).
Images are used in at least the landing/hero section and/or as section illustrations/icons to improve visual clarity.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (no additional backend services).
Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose them instead).
Do not modify immutable hook/bootstrap paths listed by the platform (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts or .tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
nonGoals: Selling insurance policies directly on the website (checkout/payments)
Integrations with external email/SMS providers for notifications
Third-party authentication providers other than Internet Identity

required: Professional hero banner illustration depicting insurance protection themes (family/home/vehicle/health icons in a clean modern style) (hero-insurance.dim_1600x600.png)
Set of minimal line icons for insurance categories (term, health, vehicle, property, stock, group) in a consistent style (insurance-icons-sprite.dim_1024x1024.png)
Simple clean logo mark for an insurance advisor brand (abstract shield/umbrella motif), transparent background (advisor-logo.dim_512x512.png)
